name: feishu-spreadsheet-mcp
description: Access Feishu/Lark spreadsheet data through FastMCP
long_description: A FastMCP-based server for accessing Feishu/Lark spreadsheet data. Built with modern FastMCP framework for improved performance and developer experience. Provides tools for listing spreadsheets, reading worksheets, searching cells, and batch operations on spreadsheet data.

tools.name: list_spreadsheets
tools.description: Get accessible spreadsheets from user's account

tools.name: get_worksheets
tools.description: Retrieve worksheets for a specific spreadsheet

app_id.title: Feishu App ID
app_id.description: Your Feishu application ID for API access

app_secret.title: Feishu App Secret
app_secret.description: Your Feishu application secret for API authentication

dtx_info.note: Requires fastmcp to be installed on target system
